Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Vase
Description: Miniature tube-shaped vase with a flat circular bottom and a small, slightly flared but greatly misshapen foot. The body is asymmetrical, bulging slightly near the bottom and narrowing slightly near the top. Forty-seven vessels of this type were found in the same foundation deposit.
